abstract: As Sam Dillon reports in Monday's Times, a national program adopted at some high schools in the U.S. has tied success on A.P. exams to financial rewards.
snippet: As Sam Dillon reports in Monday's Times, a national program adopted at some high schools in the U.S. has tied success on A.P. exams to financial rewards.

headline.main: Advanced Placement Classes for All, and $100 for a Passing Score
